Uses of Class
uk.co.datumedge.redislauncher.Configuration.Builder

    • Uses of Configuration.Builder in uk.co.datumedge.redislauncher

      Subclasses of Configuration.Builder in uk.co.datumedge.redislauncher 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Configuration.ProgrammaticBuilder
      A builder of Configuration instances that are configured programmatically.
      Methods in uk.co.datumedge.redislauncher that return Configuration.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Configuration.Builder Configuration.staticConfiguration()
      Creates a Configuration builder which has the redis server take its configuration from a redis.conf file specified on the CommandLine.
      Configuration.Builder Configuration.Builder.withCommandLine(org.apache.commons.exec.CommandLine commandLine)
      Sets the CommandLine used to launch the redis server process.
      Configuration.Builder Configuration.Builder.withPort(int port)
      Sets the port on which the redis server accepts connections.
